_header: Ne be the day never so long
Note:
Cf. 4226, Bk. 1, ln. 578; 4004, lines 5479-80; Watson (1867)
XWatson, Thomas. Proverbs and Epigrams of John Heywood (A.D. 1562). Manchester: for the Spenser Society, 1867.
_description: A couplet in a Latin sermon

OxfMert248.Transcription: Ne bee þe day neuere so longeeuere comeþ euesong
